description: Commands to manage global reach connections in a private cloud.

commands.name: az vmware global-reach-connection create
commands.summary: Create a global reach connection in a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware global-reach-connection create --global-reach-connection-name
                                         --private-cloud
                                         --resource-group
                                         [--authorization-key]
                                         [--express-route-id]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--peer-express-route-circuit]

commands.name: az vmware global-reach-connection delete
commands.summary: Delete a global reach connection in a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware global-reach-connection delete [--global-reach-connection-name]
                                         [--ids]
                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                         [--private-cloud]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--subscription]
                                         [--yes]

commands.name: az vmware global-reach-connection list
commands.summary: List global reach connections in a private cloud.

commands.name: az vmware global-reach-connection show
commands.summary: Get a global reach connection by name in a private cloud.

commands.name: az vmware global-reach-connection wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
